title: 1.12.2服务器崩溃
author: 致远秋盼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 致远秋盼 于 2020-3-22 15:18 编辑 

用的是官服+Forge核心错误报告：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  llibrary (llibrary-core-1.0.11-1.12.2.jar)
  PhosphorFMLLoadingPlugin (phosphor-1.12.2-0.2.6+build50.jar)
  CorePlugin (AcademyCraft-1.1.2.jar)
  JechCore (JustEnoughCharacters-1.12.0-3.4.7.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) (foamfix-0.10.10-1.12.2.jar)

  weaponlib (mw-1.11.7.7_mc1.12.2.jar)
  ForgePlugin (CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.9.jar)
  CorePlugin (SmoothFont-mc1.12.2-2.1.1.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// There are four lights!

Time: 20-3-22 下午3:11
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content: 内存分配太少了，分配多点

replies.author: 二白丶
replies.txt_content:
打开config里的forge.cfg
把
removeErroringEntities=false
removeErroringTileEntities=false
改为
removeErroringEntities=true
removeErroringTileEntities=true

replies.author: 致远秋盼
replies.txt_content:
二白丶 发表于 2020-3-22 15:22
打开config里的forge.cfg
把
removeErroringEntities=false
崩溃前做优化的时候已经打开了

replies.author: 致远秋盼
replies.txt_content:
御炎Roinflam 发表于 2020-3-22 18:32
内存分配太少了，分配多点
嗯，有分配了一点已经解决了，谢谢

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
致远秋盼 发表于 2020-3-22 19:27

没什么问题请点右下角的最佳
